[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat

abbrev omnimath3645_answer : ℕ := sorry
theorem omnimath3645
(x : ℕ → ℕ)
(hx1 : x 1 = 19)
(hx2 : x 2 = 95)
(hxn : ∀ n > 1, x (n + 2) = GCDMonoid.lcm (x (n + 1)) (x n) + x n)
: (xgcd (x 1995) (x 1996) = omnimath3645_answer) :=
sorry
